tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE endangered_marine_species (
  species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(50),
  conservation_area VARCHAR(50),
  population INT
)

CREATE TABLE PopulationRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id INT NOT NULL,
  area_id INT NOT NULL,
  population_count INT NOT NULL,
  record_date DATE NOT NULL
);
CREATE TABLE ConservationAreas ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, area_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE MarineSpecies ( species_id INT PRIMARY KEY, species_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, scientific_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, conservation_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE SpeciesPopulation ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, species_id INT REFERENCES MarineSpecies(species_id), conservation_area_id INT REFERENCES ConservationAreas(id), population INT NOT NULL, observation_date DATE NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE ConservationStaff ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, staff_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, role VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, conservation_area_id INT REFERENCES ConservationAreas(id) );

CREATE TABLE sightings (
    sighting_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    species_id INT NOT NULL,
    area_id INT NOT NULL,
    observation_date DATE NOT NULL,
    observer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);
